Title: json.filter(js, indx)
Description: extracts a indexed component from js. The index starts at 0 for the first element.

Title: json.filter(js, pathexpr)
Description: extracts the compgonent from js that satisfied the pathexpr string. The supported JSON path expression syntax is documented at JSONPath

Title: json."integer"(js)
Description: bigint or int or smallint or tinyint
turn a number or singleton array value or singleton object element of js into an integer. Returns null if it fails.

Title: json.isarray(str)
Description: checks the string str for JSON array compliance

Title: json.isarray(js)
Description: checks the JSON value js for JSON array compliance

Title: json.isobject(str)
Description: checks the string str for JSON object compliance

Title: json.isobject(js)
Description: checks the JSON value js for JSON object compliance

Title: json.isvalid(str)
Description: checks the string str for JSON syntax compliance

Title: json.isvalid(js)
Description: checks the JSON value js for JSON validity

Title: json.keyarray(js)
Description: returns an arraylist of key tags for the top-level components of js. Note js must represent a JSON object else an error (Object expected) is reported

Title: json.length(js)
Description: returns the number of top-level components of js

Title: json.number(js)
Description: turn a number or singleton array value or singleton object tag of js into a double. Returns null if it fails.

Title: json.text(js)
Description: glue together the values in js separated by space character

Title: json.text(js, Separator str)
Description: glue together the values in js separated by Separator string

Title: json.valuearray(js)
Description: returns an arraylist of value tags for the top-level components of js. Note js must represent a JSON object else an error (Object expected) is reported

Title: json.tojsonarray(double)
Description: convert numeric values in the column/group into a json array string

Title: json.tojsonarray(clob)
Description: convert string values in the column/group into a json array string
